This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in {{BE}} 1.7.x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with the ''Bedrock Edition'' 1.6.x releases.

== Items ==
=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Items}}
|-
| All [[food]]
|
| It is now possible to eat in [[creative]] or [[Difficulty|peaceful]] difficulty.
|-
| [[Chorus fruit]]
| [[File:Chorus Fruit JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
| Moved from natural category to item category.
|}

== Gameplay ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Gameplay}}
|-
| [[Scoreboard]] system
|
* Added basic scoreboard function.
* Track, edit and display each player's specific items.
* Triggered by using the {{cmd|scoreboard}} command or [[command block]].
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Gameplay}}
|-
| [[Chat]]
|
* Player names mentioned in chat will be highlighted in yellow.
* Entering {{key}} in chat will display the player name list completion command.
|-
| Mall
| The functions of searching at the top of the mall interface, returning to the home page, and checking purchased items have become more convenient.
|-
|[[Pause menu|Pause interface]]
|
* An "Invite Friends" button has been added to the bottom of the player list in Settings.
* Map name now appears at the top of the player list.
|}
